adr_address: 23 Rue de Bayard, 31000 Toulouse, France

editorial_summary.overview: Sophisticated apartments with kitchens, plus an outdoor pool, a gym with a sauna & a modern bar.

name: Appart-Hôtel Clément Ader

reviews.text:
We had a wonderful stay at Appart Hôtel Clément Ader, right in the heart of vibrant and family-friendly Toulouse. The location is excellent — all major sights are within walking distance, even with young children. There are plenty of shops nearby, and a supermarket just around the corner, which was very convenient. Despite being in the middle of the city, the hotel itself was remarkably quiet and peaceful — something we really appreciated after a busy day in town.

The hotel offers its own underground parking garage, which, by city standards, is just spacious enough to park comfortably. After a long day exploring the city, taking a dip in the pool was the perfect way to unwind. For our kids, it quickly became the highlight of each day.

Our room was spacious and well-equipped, including a small kitchen. The children slept on a large sofa bed, while we had a separate bedroom with comfortable beds. One minor downside was the shower in the bathtub — at 1.85 meters tall, I couldn't stand upright underneath it.

Breakfast included all the standard items you'd expect, but given the relatively high price, we found it a bit expensive for what was offered. A small suggestion for improvement: adding some bacon to the selection would be a welcome touch.

Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed both the hotel and the city. We can warmly recommend this place to any family looking for a relaxed and central stay in Toulouse!

I had a wonderful experience with Manuella. She arranged to have flowers delivered to my friend’s room during their stay, and the staff went above and beyond to make it special. Such great service! I was able to easily pay from the USA, and she took care of everything else. The bouquet was fresh, beautifully arranged, and delivered right on time. It completed my vision. My friend was delighted, and it really made their stay even more memorable. The whole process was simple and stress-free.
Big thanks to her for making it so special!
Really happy with how everything turned out —thank you a lot Manuella! 🌸

1 Star – Locked out of our room overnight, no help, no apology

We stayed here for a 3-night visit and were told at check-in that the reception desk closed at 10 PM and to call an emergency number after hours. After checking in, we left for dinner and returned at around 10:45 PM—only to find that our room key cards didn’t work. Both cards flashed red, and we couldn’t get in.

We called the emergency number over a dozen times before finally reaching someone. Instead of helping us get back into our original room—where our personal belongings, medications, and contact lenses were locked inside—she told us to go to a parking lot safe to retrieve a key to a completely different room.

The new room had no working AC, and it was nearly 100°F. We were forced to sleep there, drenched in sweat and without access to any of our things. The emergency contact offered no alternative or apology, and said there was “nothing she could do.”

The next morning, we went to reception early and were given new key cards—but again, they didn’t work. A staff member eventually came with us and said the door was broken and we’d have to wait for a technical team. Hours later, around noon, we were finally allowed back in, only to be told we had to move all our belongings to the hot, AC-less room for the rest of the stay.

Still, no compensation, no goodwill gesture, not even a sincere apology. I travel extensively and have stayed in hotels all over the world—this was by far the worst experience I’ve ever had. Totally unacceptable.

Good sized room with own kitchen and terrace. Clean and comfortable bed. There is also a nice pool and sauna.
We arrived late and hotel staff were very kind to check with us in advance. Check in and out were very smooth. Great location, very close to Gare toulouse matabiau.

I stayed at Clement Ader hotel with a friend in June 2025. We had absolutely great service. The hotel is in the very city centre with shops and restaurants nearby. The room had everything we needed. The hotel also had a pool and we were able to bring 1 friend with us at no cost. We thank all the staff at Clemet Ader and we definitely reccommend to stay in this hotel.
Regards,
Maria
